step1.para: Chock wheels and open hood.
Disconnect battery.
Raise vehicle, support axle with stands.
Remove catwalk.
Drain air tanks and disconnect all necessary air lines to remove air tank with frame assembly. Remove air tank assembly.
Remove front section of drive shaft.
Disconnect all air lines necessary to remove air dryer. Remove air dryer.
Remove bolts retaining rear cab support mount bracket to crossmember.
Use bottle jack to raise cab about 1/2 inch. Using suitable block of wood, support cab with wood on frame rail.

Remove bolts/nuts retaining rear crossmember rear gussets, both sides. Remove gussets. Remove air line support brackets at crossmember. Remove bolts/nuts retaining crossmember to front gussets, and remove crossmember. Remove bolts/nuts retaining front crossmember gussets. Remove gussets.

note.para: Working from the rear of transmission assembly.

step1.para: Remove bolts retaining shift tower, include air line support brackets. Remove shift tower and support on frame. Cover opening with shop towel.
Remove left side lower cab filler panel and disconnect block heater for access to slave valve air lines.
Disconnect all necessary air lines, including the slave valve, necessary to remove transmission. Mark air lines for installation.
Disconnect all electrical connections necessary to remove transmission.
Use proper plug to remove transmission temperature sending unit. Install plug in place of sender. Do not drain fluid.

note.para: Drain fluid only if transmission is to be serviced or replaced.

step1.para: Disconnect clutch linkage from clutch arm.
Disconnect transmission cooler lines at transmission. Cap ends.
Remove clutch inspection cover.
Remove all bolts except two (2) retaining transmission to engine.
Secure all hoses/wiring/ lines out of way for access.
Install and secure transmission jack to transmission.
Remove rear transmission support bracket from transmission.
Remove two (2) bolts retaining transmission. Remove transmission from engine.
Install transmission to engine.
Install all bolts retaining transmission to engine, include hose/line support brackets if applicable.
Install rear transmission support bracket. Torque nuts to spec.
Remove transmission jack.
Install transmission shift tower and air lines support brackets. Torque bolts to spec.
Install clutch inspection cover.
Connect clutch linkage.
Install transmission cooler lines.
Remove transmission temperature sending unit replacement plug with sender.
Connect all electrical connections to transmission.
Connect all air lines to transmission.
Install crossmember front gussets, crossmember and necessary air line and rear crossmember gussets. Torque bolts/nuts to spec.
Remove wood/jack supporting cab.
Install bolts retaining cab to crossmember. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air dryer and dryer air lines.
Install drive shaft. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air tank assembly and all air lines to tank.
Install catwalk.
Install cab panel and connect block heater wire.
Remove axle stands. Lower vehicle.
Connect battery.
Close hood.
Check transmission fluid level, add if necessary.
Remove wheel chocks.

note.para: To remove transmission from under vehicle:

step1.para: Remove step plate from battery box.
Raise vehicle enough to slide transmission from under vehicle at battery box.
